TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptManagerProxyDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerProxyDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the HTML markup that represents the control at design time.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the markup that is used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Override this method to change the generated HTML of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed

Docs.param: A component that implements the interface.
